title: Rings of simple range 2
authors: Bohdan Zabavsky, Oleh Romaniv, Andrij Sagan
abstract:
We introduce the concept of rings of simple range 2. Based on this concept,
we build a theory diagonal reduction of matrices over Bezout domain. In
particular we show that invariant Bezout domain is an elementary divisor ring
if and only if it is a rings of simple range 2.
